about_the_game:
Bring a touch of Umihara Kawase to your RPG Maker games with this free DLC!

Umihara Kawase is a cult classic indie smash hit. With its unique gameplay, this physics-based platformer is known for its heroine- a Japanese sushi chef, armed with a fishing rod, elastic fishing line, and a fishing hook. From fish-faced enemies to powerful bosses , Umihara Kawase is ready to take on the world. With Umihara Kawase Graphic set, so can you!

This pack features:
  • Material based on 4 playable characters of Umihara Kawase universe
  • Walking character sprite matching RPG Maker MV RTP style
  • Facesets for each character
  • Large portrait/busts for menus and conversations.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: RPG Maker MV - Umihara Kawase Graphic Set

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 desktop resolution or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution

short_description: Bring a touch of Umihara Kawase to your RPG Maker games with this free DLC!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese
